questions.question: Which of the following best describes the difference between difference equations and differential equations?
options: Difference equations model continuous processes, while differential equations model discrete processes.
Difference equations model rates of change, while differential equations model relationships between changes or differences of sequences.
Difference equations model relationships between changes or differences of sequences, while differential equations model rates of change.
There is no difference between difference equations and differential equations.
questions.answer: Difference equations model relationships between changes or differences of sequences, while differential equations model rates of change.
